resources.string: Big Brother GPS
wait...
Battery:
Update location
Time:
Provider:
Latitude:
Longitude:
Altitude:
Accuracy:
Bearing:
Speed:
End Program
* Work around network issue in newer androids.
* Migrated to gradle build system.\n* Updated to require android 3.2+ to hopefully fix some issues on newer devices.
* Added feature information so as to be compatible with more devices.
* Added permission RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED so newer (4.x?) androids can start BBG on boot.
* Set correct content-type header on post. This only seems to appear on 3.0 or newer. Older android versions were unaffected.
* Fixed issue where sending data to web server failed with newer android (2.3+).

* Quicker failover if GPS is disabled.\n* Connection errors are now logged on bottom of main screen instead of displaying a popup.\n* Main screen has been made scrollable so as to be usable with low-res devices.
* Adapted for different screen sizes. Tested on Galaxy Tab.

* Updated app so it can be moved to SD-card on android 2.2 devices\n* Sending of device id (IMEI/MEID) as \'deviceid=\' POST parameter.\n* Sending of subscriber id (IMSI) as \'subscriberid=\' POST parameter.

* Fixed time zone on position date so it really is UTC.
* Added options for sending/excluding most parameters from the HTTP request.
* Added time of last fix to display.
* Setting for coordinate format on display.
* Added setting for continuous locator operation. This would give better accuracy and better response if you set update time to less than a few minutes, but will drain your battery faster.
* Fixed date format.

* Added 'provider' HTTP parameter to inform server of which location provider provided the position
* Added altitude (Parameter-name: altitude).
* Added speed and bearing (parameter-names: speed, bearing).
* Added time(parameter-name: time).
* Option to allow HTTP response to be displayed in the notification bar instead of current position.
* Renamed end program button.
* Added button to trigger location update.
* Doesn\'t neuter sheep anymore.\n* Added this changelog that you are reading right now.

* Added battery state notification.\n* Added preferences setting to hide app from notification bar\n* Changed update interval to allow decimal numbers for those that wish to update more often than once a minute.
* Added a \'secret\' parameter that (if set) will be sent to the server as part of the POST request.
* Fixes a forgotten call to unregisterReceiver() on app shutdown. App is now marked as singleInstance, since it can\'t really run more than one instance anyway.
* Fixes a GPS timeout problem where the service sometimes didn\'t switch locator from GPS to network on timeout.
* First version
